categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Demas was a Male Miraluka Jedi Master stationed on Corellia during the  Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.While on Corellia he taught Republic individuals the skill of Diplomacy.
Demas appears only in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic as his character was cut from the game. Demas's file can be found on Jedipedia.
